Title: Inochi
Writer: Sumio Ohmori, Miri Ryu, Miri Yu (novels)

Plot: Yu Miri is a writer who's just become pregnant by her married lover. When she decides to keep the baby without his help, her ex-boyfriend Yutaka, decides to help raise him.
